ch0060_00_anzu/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was getting tired of waiting for you!
ch0060_00_anzu/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s train and get superduper stronger together!
ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0701_01_10:
People in Kanto say that Weezing are Pokémon
that eat poison gas and get bigger.
ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0701_02_10:
And would you believe that they are really
popular among girls?
ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0701_03_10:
Yeah, I figured you wouldn’t.
I might be the only girl that does like them.
ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0702_02_10:
I might sometimes make him angry and make him
explode, though.
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_01_10:
My father is Koga, of the Elite Four!
I want to become more like him.
That’s why I have to train even harder!
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_02_10:
Father is very strong and strict. He is also cool
with how skilled of a Pokémon Trainer he is!
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_03_10:
But more importantly, he’s kind!
Isn’t he awesome?
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_04_10:
But I won’t lose in the PML!
I’m still a Pokémon Trainer first and foremost
and a daughter second!
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0702_01_10:
Overcoming the person you admire the most is
the ultimate form of flattery!
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0702_02_10: So I was hoping that I could battle you a lot.
ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0702_03_10: That way, we can polish each other’s skills!
ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0701_01_10:
Everybody in the Fuchsia City Gym disguises
themselves to look like me!
You can imagine how hard it is to find me!
ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0701_02_10:
It’s really fun, and a lot of the challengers
have good things to say about it, but...
ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0701_03_10: nobody realizes it’s me if I ever dress up.
ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0702_01_10: There are a lot of fashionable people on Pasio.
ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0702_02_10:
But whenever I dress up, everybody asks if it’s
just another disguise.
ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0702_03_10: I mean...that’s not really my intention.
ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0701_01_10:
My ninja uniform is specially tailored! It’s made
from Ariados silk!
ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s really durable! And even better, it’s warm
in the winter and really cool in the summer!
ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0701_03_10:
But the best part is that it makes me feel as if
Ariados is always protecting me.
ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0702_01_10:
People sometimes make gloves or scarves with
Ariados silk, too.
ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0702_02_10: Maybe I can make you some!
ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
What do you think of Poison-type Pokémon?
ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_02_10:
I think it’s great that each Pokémon has moves
that it alone specializes in.
ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_03_10:
And they use those moves to get any advantage
they can and become stronger, whether their
type is Fire, Grass, Water, or even Poison.
ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_04_10:
Of course, Poison isn’t one of the popular types,
but I’m not ashamed to say that I like it.
ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0702_01_10:
You can ask me anything about Poison types!
I’ll teach you everything I know!
ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m learning a lot about moves from you,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
It’s nice to be able to exchange knowledge.
ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, you can have this!
It was caught in Ariados’s thread!
ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0701_02_10:
Whether it’s a Pokémon or an item,
there’s always a right place to use it!
ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0702_01_10:
You can find a lot of cool stuff caught in
Ariados’s web. Isn’t that cool?
ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0702_02_10:
When I was a kid, I was clumsy and would get
caught in Ariados’s web myself.
ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0701_01_10:
My father is a member of the Elite Four!
He’s one of the best Pokémon Trainers 
in the world!
ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0701_02_10: I inherited my Gym from my father!
ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0701_03_10:
I still have a lot to learn, but one day, I’m going
to become so strong that both my father and all
the other Gym Leaders will acknowledge me!
ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0702_01_10:
I want to become stronger so that I’ll be a
better Gym Leader!
ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0702_02_10:
I have to study more about poison and practice
my ninja techniques...
There are a lot of things I have to do!
ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0702_03_10:
I’m going to be challenging you to battles a lot
more in the future, so be ready for that!
ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0701_01_10: I’m not one to brag, but I think I’m pretty strong!
ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0701_02_10:
Of course, I still have a lot to learn, and I’m not
nearly strong enough for my father to accept me.
ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0701_03_10:
But as long as I’m with you, 
I know I can surpass all my limits!
ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0702_01_10: I apparently have a little bit of stage fright.
ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0702_02_10:
But whenever I’m talking to you,
I can relax and use my full strength!
ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0702_03_10:
So let’s stick together!
I don’t think I can do this without you!
ch0060_00_anzu/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! I always start my day with a long jog
to help strengthen my legs!
ch0060_00_anzu/3002_0701_01_10:
Life is full of distractions, but I’m gonna do my
best to stay focused on my training today!
ch0060_00_anzu/3003_0701_01_10:
If I ever want to beat you or my father,
I’ve gotta train hard every day!
ch0060_00_anzu/3004_0701_01_10:
I was just on my way to give
my father his lunch!
ch0060_00_anzu/3005_0701_01_10:
If your eyes aren’t used to the dark,
I can guide you at night.
ch0060_00_anzu/3006_0701_01_10:
Moving through the shadows of night...
Mark of a true ninja!
